safety_flags.signal: Use of jargon or in-group terminology
safety_flags.benign_explanation: The user is simply explaining an internet acronym to someone unfamiliar with it.

safety_flags.signal: Use of potentially suggestive or sexual content
safety_flags.benign_explanation: The user is discussing a personal health or lifestyle choice.

localization.suggested_vibe: Internet slang, possibly associated with online communities discussing self-improvement or specific lifestyle choices.
